title: Number of H-1B visas issued in U.S. , by countries with the most recipients 2011
summary: This statistic presents the number of muslims in spain in 2018 , broken down by nationality . That year , there were a total of approximately two million muslims in spain . Almost 848 thousand had Spanish nationality , followed by muslims with a Moroccan nationality with figures that almost reached 770 thousand individuals .
gold: This statistic shows the number of H-1B visas issued in the United States as of 2011 , in order of the countries with the most recipients . 72,438 H-1B visas had been issued to Indian workers for the United States as of 2011 .
